hero_image.title: Hero image - Słownik terminów internetowych
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczne workspace flat lay z laptopem, notatnikiem ze słownikiem terminów IT i żółtym długopisem
hero_image.alt_text: Workspace z laptopem pokazującym dashboard IT i notatnikiem ze słownikiem terminów internetowych
hero_image.prompt: Minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying clean analytics dashboard interface, open notebook with handwritten IT terms and definitions, yellow pen highlighting keywords, white wooden desk, smartphone beside, natural daylight from window, muted colors black white gray with yellow accent, professional business aesthetic, high quality, sharp focus, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business workspace laptop notebook IT terms glossary
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean minimalist workspace, natural lighting, muted colors with yellow accent pen

section_media.title: Diagram infrastruktury web - hosting, domena, serwer
section_media.description: Prosty diagram pokazujący relacje między domeną, hostingiem i serwerem
section_media.alt_text: Diagram relacji między domeną, hostingiem i serwerem w infrastrukturze internetowej
section_media.prompt: Clean technical diagram showing relationship between domain, hosting and server, simple geometric shapes connected with arrows, labeled boxes in Polish, minimalist style with black text on white background, subtle gray shadows, professional infographic design

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Simple technical diagram, clean lines, minimalist. Can be created with draw.io or Canva

section_media.title: Infografika różnic między pozycjonowaniem a indeksowaniem
section_media.description: Porównanie wizualne pozycjonowania vs indeksowania z przykładami
section_media.alt_text: Infografika różnic między pozycjonowaniem a indeksowaniem stron w Google
section_media.prompt: Split comparison infographic showing indexing vs SEO positioning, left side shows Google knowing the page (indexed), right side shows high ranking (positioned), simple icons, arrows, before/after comparison, clean design black white gray with yellow highlights, professional style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Split-screen comparison design, simple icons, professional color scheme

section_media.title: Funnel porzucania koszyków e-commerce
section_media.description: Diagram lejka pokazujący statystyki porzucania koszyków na każdym etapie
section_media.alt_text: Funnel e-commerce pokazujący statystyki porzucania koszyków od produktu do płatności
section_media.prompt: E-commerce conversion funnel diagram showing cart abandonment statistics, funnel shape with percentages, stages from product view to payment completion, clean infographic style, blue gradient colors, professional data visualization

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Funnel-shaped diagram with percentages, professional blue color scheme

section_media.title: Porównanie wireframe vs mockup vs prototyp
section_media.description: Tri-panel showing evolution from wireframe to mockup to interactive prototype
section_media.alt_text: Porównanie wireframe mockup prototyp w procesie projektowania UX UI
section_media.prompt: Three-panel comparison showing wireframe mockup prototype evolution, left panel shows simple wireframe sketch, middle shows colorful mockup, right shows interactive prototype with hover states, clean progression illustration, labeled stages, minimalist design

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Three-stage progression, clean design process visualization

section_media.title: Ikony bezpieczeństwa - SSL, firewall, backup, RODO
section_media.description: Zestaw ikon reprezentujących kluczowe elementy bezpieczeństwa online
section_media.alt_text: Ikony bezpieczeństwa internetowego SSL firewall backup RODO dla przedsiębiorców
section_media.prompt: Set of security icons in grid layout: SSL certificate shield, firewall barrier, backup cloud, GDPR compliance checkmark, clean minimalist icons, consistent style, black and gray on white background with subtle yellow accents, professional business iconography

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: cybersecurity icons SSL firewall backup GDPR
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Minimalist icon set, consistent style, professional business aesthetic

section_media.title: Screenshot Google Analytics - kluczowe metryki
section_media.description: Przykład dashboardu Google Analytics z zaznaczonymi kluczowymi metrykami
section_media.alt_text: Dashboard Google Analytics z metrykami konwersji CTR dla przedsiębiorców
section_media.prompt: Clean Google Analytics dashboard mockup showing key metrics like sessions, conversion rate, CTR, highlighted important sections with subtle overlays, professional interface design, realistic data but anonymized, clean screenshot style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional analytics interface, clean dashboard view with highlighted metrics
